laptop.title: Sankethik Shodhana - 2015
laptop.message: A National Level Technical Symposium on 30th & 31 March 2015. Events: Paper Presentation & Project Expo.Online registrations are open at www.svpcet.org

laptop.title: Ugadi Fest in SVPCET
laptop.message: It is here by informed that all the students are instructed to actively participate in the Ugadi Fest which is being organised at SVPCET campus on 20-03-2015.

laptop.title: External Examinations Results
laptop.message: August 2014 external examinations results are declared.- ExamSection,SVPCET.
